Module: Sonos-Commands

Collection of - complex SONOS commands such as playGroupNotification, group handling, My Sonos handling - the basic executeAction command - helpers such as getRadioId handling the communication above SOAP level. SOAP Level communication is done in module Soap.
Since:
  • 2020-11-11
Author:
  • Henning Klages
Source:
  • Sonos-Commands.js, line 3
See:
  • Wiki for overview.

Methods

(static) createGroupSnapshot(node, membersAsPlayersPlus, options)

Creates snapshot of group.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
node object current node - for debugging
membersAsPlayersPlus array array of node-sonos player objects, coordinator/selected player has index 0 members.length = 1 in case independent
options object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
snapVolumes boolean <optional>
 false capture all players volume
snapMutestates boolean <optional>
 false capture all players mute state
Source:
  • Sonos-Commands.js, line 314
Throws:
if invalid response from SONOS player

(static) didlXmlToArray(didlXml, itemName)

Returns an array of items (DidlBrowseItem) extracted from action "Browse" output (didlXml).
Parameters:
Name Type Description
didlXml string Browse response property Result (DIDL-Light string in xml format)
itemName string property in DIDL lite holding the data such as "item" or "container"
Source:
  • Sonos-Commands.js, line 855
Throws:
  • if any parameter is missing
    Type
    error
  • from method xml2js and invalid response (missing id, title) Browse provides the results (Result, ... ) in form of a DIDL-Lite xml format. The includes several attributes such as xmlns:dc" and entries all named "container" or "item". These include xml tags such as 'res'. The items in the container includes also xml tag content. The uri is a xml tag content of res, so we have to define tag = uriIdentifier.
    Type
    error

(static) executeActionV6(playerUrlOrigin, endpoint, actionName, actionInArgs)

Sends action with actionInArgs to endpoint at playerUrlOrigin and returns result.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
playerUrlOrigin string the player url such as http://192.168.178.37:1400
endpoint string the endpoint name such as /MediaRenderer/AVTransport/Control
actionName string the action name such as Seek
actionInArgs object all arguments - throws error if one argument is missing!
Source:
  • Sonos-Commands.js, line 697
Throws:
  • nrcsp: any inArgs property missing, http return invalid status or not 200, missing body, unexpected response
    Type
    error
  • xml2js.parseStringPromise Everything OK if statusCode === 200 and body includes expected response value (set) or value (get)
    Type
    error

(static) getAllPlayerList(sonosPlayer)

Get array of all players in household.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
sonosPlayer object valid player object
Source:
  • Sonos-Commands.js, line 481
Throws:
if getAllGroups returns invalid value if player name not found in any group

(static) getGroupMemberDataV2(sonosPlayer, playerNameopt)

Get array of all SONOS player data in same group as player. Coordinator is first in array. hidden player are ignored!
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
sonosPlayer object valid player object
playerName string <optional>
 valid player name. If missing search is based on sonosPlayer ip address!
Source:
  • Sonos-Commands.js, line 415
Throws:
if getAllGroups returns invalid value if player name not found in any group

(static) getMusicServiceId(xuri)

Name Type Description
xuri string such as "x-rincon-cpcontainer:1004206ccatalog%2falbums%2fB07NW3FSWR%2f%23album_desc?sid=201&flags=8300&sn=14"

(static) getMySonosV3(playerUrlOrigin)

Get array of all My Sonos items - maximum 200. Includes SONOS-Playlists (maximum 999)
Parameters:
Name Type Description
playerUrlOrigin string valid SONOS player URL.origin http://192.168.178.35:1400
Source:
  • Sonos-Commands.js, line 536
Throws:
nrcsp: invalid return from Browse, didlXmlToArray error Restriction: Maximum number of My-Sonos items: 200, maximum number of SONOS-Playlists 999. Restrictions: MusicLibrary/ Sonos playlists without service id. Restrictions: Audible Audio books are missing. Restrictions: Pocket Casts Podcasts without uri, only metadata
Type
error

(static) getRadioId(xuri) → {string}

Get TuneIn radioId from Transport URI - only for Music Service TuneIn
Parameters:
Name Type Description
xuri string uri such as x-sonosapi-stream:s24903?sid=254&flags=8224&sn=0
Source:
  • Sonos-Commands.js, line 993
Returns:
TuneIn radio id or if not found empty prerequisite: xuri with radio id is in between "x-sonosapi-stream:" and "?sid=254"
Type
string

(static) playGroupNotification(node, membersAsPlayersPlus, options)

Play notification on a group using coordinator. Coordinator is index 0
Parameters:
Name Type Description
node object current node - for debugging
membersAsPlayersPlus array array of node-sonos player object with baseUrl, coordinator has index 0 length = 1 is allowed if independent
options object options
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
uri string uri
metadata string <optional>
 metadata - will be generated if missing
volume string volume during notification - if -1 don't use, range 1 .. 99
sameVolume boolean all player in group play at same volume level
automaticDuration boolean duration will be received from player
duration string format hh:mm:ss
Source:
  • Sonos-Commands.js, line 100
Throws:
if invalid response from setAVTransportURI, play,

(static) playJoinerNotification(node, coordinatorPlus, joinerPlus, options)

Play notification on a single joiner - a player in a group not being coordinator.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
node object current node - for debugging
coordinatorPlus object coordinator in group as node-sonos player object with baseUrl
joinerPlus object jointer in group
options object options
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
uri string uri
metadata string <optional>
 metadata - will be generated if missing
volume string volume during notification. - 1 means don't touch. integer 1 .. 99
automaticDuration boolean
duration string format hh:mm:ss
Source:
  • Sonos-Commands.js, line 228
Throws:
all from setAVTransportURI(), avTransportService()*, play, setVolume Hint: joiner will leave group, play notification and rejoin the group. State will be imported from group.

Parameters:
Name Type Description

snapshot object
membersAsPlayersPlus array array of node-sonos player objects, coordinator/selected player has index 0 members.length = 1 in case independent

(static) sortedGroupArray(allGroupsData, groupIndex)

Returns a sorted array with all group members. Coordinator is in first place.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
allGroupsData array output form sonos getAllGroups()
groupIndex number pointing to the specific group 0 ... allGroupsData.length-1
Source:
  • Sonos-Commands.js, line 798
Throws:
if index out of range
